QuestData.Title: The Gronn Strategy
QuestData.Description: Raz,$b$bYour orders are to capture four additional gronn for weaponization.$b$bOf your first group, only one survived the entire process.$b$bOne attacked our soldiers relentlessly and had to be put down. Another fell victim to a misfire while being fitted. Yet another rolled onto its cannons in its sleep. We're still cleaning up that mess.$b$bRest assured, your efforts are not in vain.$b$b- Captain Brak
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the weaponization orders to Rexxar at Breaker's Crown.
